title: Matter and energy
brief_description: The film presents the concept that everything in the universe may be reduced to matter and energy. Matter in its different forms is presented, elements, compounds and mixtures are defined, and the laws of conservation of matter and energy are stated. The film ends with a brief discussion on atomic energy.
